questions.question: In a transformer, if N2 is number of secondary winding N1 is the number of primary winding then, if (N2/N1) ratio is greater than 1.It is called as ________
In a transformer, if N2 is number of secondary winding N1 is the number of primary winding then, if (N2/N1) ratio is equal to 1.It is called as ________
The tap changing control equipment includes ________

answers.b: Line drop compensator equipment used along with the current transformer to provide voltage control at a point remote from the measuring point

questions.question: 16 step tap changes provide ________ voltage change in each step.
In case of, OFF circuit taps, the transformer must be _________ before the tap changer mechanism is operated.
Advantage of using instrument Transformer is

answers.a: Standard rated instruments may be used easily
answers.b: It provides safety for operating personal
answers.c: Both Standard rated instruments may be used easily and It provides safety for operating personal

questions.question: Potential transformers are made with

answers.a: Low quality icon core operating at very low flex density so that the magnetizing current may be large
answers.b: High quality icon core operating at very high flex density so that the magnetizing current may be large
answers.c: High quality icon core operating at very high flex density so that the magnetizing current may be very small
answers.d: High quality icon core operating at very low flex density so that the magnetizing current may be very small

questions.question: A high magnitude alternating current can be measured by a combination of _________ and_________.

answers.a: A high magnitude alternating current can be measured by a combination of _________ and_________.
answers.b: Current transformer and high range ammeter
answers.c: Current transformer and low range ammeter

questions.question: The current transformer ratio is not equal to the ratio of secondary to primary turns.

answers.b: The above statement is false, because of the effect of magnetizing current
answers.c: The above statement is true, because of the effect of magnetizing current

questions.question: A current transformer must never be operated on open circuit for

answers.a: There will be no secondary m.m.f. and since the primary current (and m.m.f.) is fixed, the core flux will increase enormously. This will cause large amount of eddy current and hysteresis losses and the resulting high temperature may damage the insulation or even the core
answers.b: As the secondary side is open, a very high voltage will be induced in the multi-turn secondary and this high voltage is dangerous to both life and to the insulation
answers.c: There will be no secondary m.m.f. and since the primary current (and m.m.f.) is fixed, the core flux will increase enormously. This will cause large amount of eddy current and hysteresis losses and the resulting high temperature may damage the insulation or even the core and As the secondary side is open, a very high voltage will be induced in the multi-turn secondary and this high voltage is dangerous to both life and to the insulation

questions.question: _______ is used to make sure that an electrical circuit can be completely de-energized for service or maintenance.
Isolators are
Characteristic of high voltage rating Circuit Breaker :-

answers.b: Capability of interrupting capacitive and inductive circuits and fault currents of all values within their rating
answers.d: Both High reliability electrically and mutually and Capability of interrupting capacitive and inductive circuits and fault currents of all values within their rating

The major advantage of single bus-bar system is that fault on one part of the busï¿½bar or system does not completely shut down the whole station.
Bus bar can be arranged in __________

answers.c: Both Single bus-bar system and Double bus-bar system with sectionalisation

questions.question: _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
